channel.title: Hello World! on Zhe's Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Hello World! on Zhe's Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Product Sense - The Journey to Crack Case Study
item.description: Having been a product manager/analyst for two years, I truly enjoy the data-driven part of my work. Metric design happens throughout the whole product life cycle.

item.title: SQL - Translate SQL to Python
item.description: Since SQL is a very important part of every Data Scientist’s job. To use it and use it well is our top priority. So I’ll start a series of post on this topic, covering “SQL to Python”, “SQL optimization”, “SQL practice” . There are already a bunch of basic SQL tutorials online so I’ll not bother you with that - more to come in advanced topics!

item.title: Python - OOP study notes
item.description: https://realpython.com/python3-object-oriented-programming/ classes: create user-defined data structures class defined functions: methods, identify the behaviors and actions instance: object that is built from a class and contains real data. Define a class, which is a sort of blueprint for an object Instantiate an object from a class Use attributes and methods to define the properties and behaviors of an object Use inheritance to create child classes from a parent class Reference a method on a parent class using super() Check if an object inherits from another class using isinstance() The rest is a bit messy - it’s just my study journey.

item.title: Interview Prep: Keys for Answering AB Testing Questions
item.description: 1 What unit you will choose to run the test? Usually User_id. If no login process, then use device_id or cookie. 2 Your colleague gave you two data set and told you they are test/control groups from an A/B test. What will you do to make sure the data set are appropriate to use? A/A test. 3 What will you do if you find users been assigned to both test and control group?

item.title: Project 1: TikTok Call
item.description: Three hundred and forty-eight years, six months, and nineteen days ago to-day, the Parisians awoke to the sound of all the bells in the triple circuit of the city, the university, and the town ringing a full peal.
